item.title: kafka-case-with-python
item.author: 1216062928@qq.com (Who)
item.description: Kafka in python Build kafka environment kafka find / -name \*kafka_\* | head -1 | grep -o '\kafka[^\n]*' kafka_2.11-2.0.1 python python -V #use pyenv 3.6.6 zookeeper version: echo stat|nc 127.0.0.1 2181 Zookeeper version: 3.4.9-1757313, built on 08/23/2016 06:50 GMT Clients: /172.23.0.1:41242[0](queued=0,recved=1,sent=0) /172.23.0.2:49830[1](queued=0,recved=1152,sent=1153) Latency min/avg/max: -33/0/91 Received: 5129 Sent: 5139 Connections: 2 Outstanding: 0 Zxid: 0xa3 Mode: standalone Node count: 133 Test Install Python Client kafka-python 1.4.4 pip install kafka-python Producer
